Verses: 1 yobu Pradhiyuththaramaaga:
2 en Sanjalam Nirukkappattu, En Nirppandham Ellaam Tharaasile Vaikkappattaal Nalamaayirukkum.
3 appozhudhu Adhu Kadarkarai Manalaip Paarkkilum Baaramaayirukkum; Aagaiyaal En Dhukkam Sollimudiyaadhu.
4 sarvavallavarin Ambugal Enakkul Thaiththirukkiradhu; Avaigalin Visham En Uyiraik Kudikkiradhu; Dhevanaal Undaagum Bayangarangal Enakku Munbaaga Aniyaniyaai Nirkiradhu.
5 pullirukkira Idaththile Kaattukkazhudhai Kaththumo? Thanakkuth Theevanamirukkira Idaththile Erudhu Kadharumo?
6 rusiyillaadha Padhaarththaththai Uppillaamal Saappidakkoodumo? Muttaiyin Vellaikkaruvil Suvai Undo?
7 ungal Vaarththaigalai En Aaththumaa Thodamaatten Engiradhu; Avaigal Arosigamaana Pojanampol Irukkiradhu.
8 aa, En Mandraattu Enakku Arulappattu, Naan Vaanjippadhai Dhevan Enakkuth Thandhu,
9 dhevan Ennai Norukka Siththamaai, Thammudaiya Kaiyai Neetti Ennaith Thundiththuppottaal Nalamaayirukkum.
10 appozhudhaavadhu Enakku Aarudhal Irukkume; Appozhudhu Ennaith Thappavidaadha Novile Maraththiruppen; Parisuththarudaiya Vaarththaigalai Naan Maraiththu Vaikkavillai, Avar Ennaith Thappavidaaraaga.
11 naan Kaaththukkondirukka En Belan Emmaaththiram? En Jeevanai Neediththirukkappanna En Mudivu Eppadippattadhu?
12 en Belan Karkalin Belano? En Maamsam Vengalamo?
13 enakku Udhaviyaanadhu Ondrum Illaiyallavo? Sagaayam Ennaivittu Neengitre.
14 ubaadhikkappadugiravanukku Avanudaiya Snegidhanaal Dhayai Kidaikkavendum, Avano Sarvavallavarukku Bayappadaadhepogiraan.
15 en Sagodharar Kaattaarupola Mosampannugiraargal; Aarugalin Vellaththaippolak Kadandhupogiraargal.
16 avaigal Kulirkaalap Panikkattiyinaalum, Adhil Vizhundhirukkira Uraindha Mazhaiyinaalum Kalangalaagi,
17 ushnan Kandavudane Urugi Vatri, Anal Pattavudane Thangal Sthalaththil Uruvazhindhupogindrana.
18 avaigaludaiya Vazhigalin Pokkugal Ingumangum Piriyum; Avaigal Virudhaavile Paravi Ondrum Illaamarpogum.
19 themaavin Payanakkaarar Thedi, Sebaavin Payanakkoottangal Avaigalmel Nambikkai Vaiththu,
20 thaangal Ippadi Nambinadhinaale Vetkappadugiraargal; Avvidamattum Vandhu Kalangippogiraargal.
21 appadiye Neengalum Ippozhudhu Ondrukkum Udhavaamarponeergal; En Aabaththaik Kandu Bayappadugireergal.
22 enakku Edhaagilum Konduvaarungal Endrum, Ungal Aasthiyilirundhu Enakku Yaadhoru Vegumaanam Kodungal Endrum;
23 alladhu Saththuruvin Kaikku Ennaith Thappuviyungal, Valladikkaararin Kaikku Ennai Neengalaakki Meettuvidungal Endrum Naan Sonnadhundo?
24 enakku Ubadhesampannungal, Naan Mavunamaayiruppen; Naan Edhile Thavarineno Adhai Enakkuth Theriyappaduththungal.
25 semmaiyaana Vaarththaigalil Evvalavu Vallamai Undu? Ungal Kadindhukolludhalinaal Kaariyam Enna?
26 kadindhukolla Neengal Vaarththaigalai Yosiththu, Nambikkaiyatravanudaiya Vaarththaigalaik Kaatrile Vittuvidugireergalo?
27 ippadi Seydhu Thikkatravanmel Neengal Vizhundhu, Ungal Snegidhanukkup Padukuzhiyai Vettugireergal.
28 ippodhum Ungalukku Siththamaanaal Ennai Nokkip Paarungal; Appozhudhu Naan Poi Sollugireno Endru Ungalukkup Praththiyatchamaai Vilangum.
29 neengal Thirumbungal, Akkiramam Kaanappadaadhirukkum; Thirumbungal En Needhi Adhile Vilangum.
30 en Naavile Akkiramam Undo? En Vaai Aagaadhavaigalaip Paguththariyaadho?
